text: @NikkiHaley @realDonaldTrump @VP I hate to tell you this but all Americans don’t feel the way that you do especially when this administration knew about the coronavirus early and dismissed it and secondly back in 2017 trump dismantled the pandemic office. So I am not grateful when people are dying needlessly.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
